about_the_game:
In this brief but intense game, you play as Arisa, a girl who has been invited by her best friend Ayaka to Reika’s birthday party, one of her close friends. At the party, you’ll also meet the adorable Kotomi. You’ll have the opportunity to spend time with and get to know all three girls better. It will be up to you to decide, across a total of twelve endings, whether Arisa ends the night alone, with one of the two, with up to two of the three girls, or even with all the girls together.

Yuri Party is a visual novel that uses realistic art and is based on choices. Choosing one choice over another will lead you down one path or another. Make the right choices and you can end the night with all four girls enjoying each other! Or be less ambitious and choose just two of them. Or, if you're a romantic looking for true love, win over your favorite and enjoy an emotional ending with her.

ARISA:

The protagonist of the story. A girl who has just returned to her country after living abroad for ten years. She has been invited by her childhood best friend, Ayaka, to the birthday party of one of her friends. A great opportunity to make up for lost time with her best friend and even strengthen their bond further. Both with her and with her friends. She is a shy and sweet girl who tries her best to get along with others.

AYAKA:

Arisa's best friend and the center of the party. Ayaka is an outgoing and extroverted girl who has no trouble speaking her mind. Over the past ten years, she has made many great friends, but Arisa has always held a bigger place in her heart than anyone else, and now that she’s back, she has no intention of letting her go.

KOTOMI:

One of Ayaka's best friends. She is a cute girl and loves to show it off. She is very cheerful and energetic. Is she always like this, or does she have hidden secrets? She has known about Arisa for a long time because Ayaka always talks about her, and she is eager to meet her, and maybe not just meet her.

REIKA:

The birthday girl of the party. A refined girl from a wealthy family. At first, she has no interest in Arisa and won’t hesitate to make that clear to her face. Is it possible to break through her tough exterior and discover the tender heart she hides? If she really has one, that is.

content_descriptors.notes:
In this game, you will find two types of depictions of sex.
1: When you reach the end of each ending, your character will have explicit sexual relations with the girl you have chosen, this sex will be shown with static images and also with animations, it will show the women's genitals and their voices will be played.
2: When you reach the last two endings of the game, the girls will play the classic game of "truth or dare" where, as the game progresses, the challenges will become more erotic until they end up showing spanking, an erotic dance, genitals and explicit sex.

name: Yuri Party!
short_description: One, two, or three girls! Fall for any or all of them and enjoy watching them interact.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
